verses.verse: Now these are the commandments <S%H4687><s%>, the statutes <S%H2706><s%>, and the judgments <S%H4941><s%>, which the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> to teach <S%H3925><s%> you, that ye might do <S%H6213><s%> them in the land <S%H776><s%> whither ye go <S%H5674><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> it: go: Heb. pass over

That thou mightest fear <S%H3372><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>, to keep <S%H8104><s%> all his statutes <S%H2708><s%> and his commandments <S%H4687><s%>, which I command <S%H6680><s%> thee, thou, and thy son <S%H1121><s%>, and thy son's <S%H1121><s%> son <S%H1121><s%>, all the days <S%H3117><s%> of thy life <S%H2416><s%>; and that thy days <S%H3117><s%> may be prolonged <S%H748><s%>.

Hear <S%H8085><s%> therefore, O Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and observe <S%H8104><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> it; that it may be well <S%H3190><s%> with thee, and that ye may increase <S%H7235><s%> mightily <S%H3966><s%>, as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of thy fathers <S%H1><s%> hath promised <S%H1696><s%> thee, in the land <S%H776><s%> that floweth <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey <S%H1706><s%>.
Hear <S%H8085><s%>, O Israel <S%H3478><s%>: The LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> is one <S%H259><s%> LORD <S%H3068><s%>:
And thou shalt love <S%H157><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> with all thine heart <S%H3824><s%>, and with all thy soul <S%H5315><s%>, and with all thy might <S%H3966><s%>.
And these words <S%H1697><s%>, which I command <S%H6680><s%> thee this day <S%H3117><s%>, shall be in thine heart <S%H3824><s%>:

And thou shalt teach them diligently <S%H8150><s%> unto thy children <S%H1121><s%>, and shalt talk <S%H1696><s%> of them when thou sittest <S%H3427><s%> in thine house <S%H1004><s%>, and when thou walkest <S%H3212><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%>, and when thou liest down <S%H7901><s%>, and when thou risest up <S%H6965><s%>. teach: Heb. whet, or, sharpen
And thou shalt bind <S%H7194><s%> them for a sign <S%H226><s%> upon thine hand <S%H3027><s%>, and they shall be as frontlets <S%H2903><s%> between thine eyes <S%H5869><s%>.
And thou shalt write <S%H3789><s%> them upon the posts <S%H4201><s%> of thy house <S%H1004><s%>, and on thy gates <S%H8179><s%>.

And it shall be, when the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> shall have brought <S%H935><s%> thee into the land <S%H776><s%> which he sware <S%H7650><s%> unto thy fathers <S%H1><s%>, to Abraham <S%H85><s%>, to Isaac <S%H3327><s%>, and to Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, to give <S%H5414><s%> thee great <S%H1419><s%> and goodly <S%H2896><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%>, which thou buildedst <S%H1129><s%> not,

And houses <S%H1004><s%> full <S%H4392><s%> of all good <S%H2898><s%> things, which thou filledst <S%H4390><s%> not, and wells <S%H953><s%> digged <S%H2672><s%>, which thou diggedst <S%H2672><s%> not, vineyards <S%H3754><s%> and olive trees <S%H2132><s%>, which thou plantedst <S%H5193><s%> not; when thou shalt have eaten <S%H398><s%> and be full <S%H7646><s%>;

Then beware <S%H8104><s%> lest thou forget <S%H7911><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, which brought thee forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, from the house <S%H1004><s%> of bondage <S%H5650><s%>. bondage: Heb. bondmen or, servants
Thou shalt fear <S%H3372><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>, and serve <S%H5647><s%> him, and shalt swear <S%H7650><s%> by his name <S%H8034><s%>.
Ye shall not go <S%H3212><s%> after <S%H310><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%>, of the gods <S%H430><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> which are round about <S%H5439><s%> you;

(For the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> is a jealous <S%H7067><s%> God <S%H410><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> you) lest the anger <S%H639><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> be kindled <S%H2734><s%> against thee, and destroy <S%H8045><s%> thee from off the face <S%H6440><s%> of the earth <S%H127><s%>.
Ye shall not tempt <S%H5254><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, as ye tempted <S%H5254><s%> him in Massah <S%H4532><s%>.

Ye shall diligently <S%H8104><s%> keep <S%H8104><s%> the commandments <S%H4687><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, and his testimonies <S%H5713><s%>, and his statutes <S%H2706><s%>, which he hath commanded <S%H6680><s%> thee.

And thou shalt do <S%H6213><s%> that which is right <S%H3477><s%> and good <S%H2896><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>: that it may be well <S%H3190><s%> with thee, and that thou mayest go in <S%H935><s%> and possess <S%H3423><s%> the good <S%H2896><s%> land <S%H776><s%> which the LORD <S%H3068><s%> sware <S%H7650><s%> unto thy fathers <S%H1><s%>,
To cast out <S%H1920><s%> all thine enemies <S%H341><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> thee, as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath spoken <S%H1696><s%>.

And when thy son <S%H1121><s%> asketh <S%H7592><s%> thee in time to come <S%H4279><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, What mean the testimonies <S%H5713><s%>, and the statutes <S%H2706><s%>, and the judgments <S%H4941><s%>, which the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> hath commanded <S%H6680><s%> you? in: Heb. to morrow

Then thou shalt say <S%H559><s%> unto thy son <S%H1121><s%>, We were Pharaoh's <S%H6547><s%> bondmen <S%H5650><s%> in Egypt <S%H4714><s%>; and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> brought us out <S%H3318><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> with a mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%>:

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shewed <S%H5414><s%> signs <S%H226><s%> and wonders <S%H4159><s%>, great <S%H1419><s%> and sore <S%H7451><s%>, upon Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, upon Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, and upon all his household <S%H1004><s%>, before our eyes <S%H5869><s%>: sore: Heb. evil
And he brought us out <S%H3318><s%> from thence, that he might bring us in <S%H935><s%>, to give <S%H5414><s%> us the land <S%H776><s%> which he sware <S%H7650><s%> unto our fathers <S%H1><s%>.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> us to do <S%H6213><s%> all these statutes <S%H2706><s%>, to fear <S%H3372><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%>, for our good <S%H2896><s%> always <S%H3117><s%>, that he might preserve us alive <S%H2421><s%>, as it is at this day <S%H3117><s%>.

And it shall be our righteousness <S%H6666><s%>, if we observe <S%H8104><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> all these <S%H2063><s%> commandments <S%H4687><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%>, as he hath commanded <S%H6680><s%> us.
